name: ssl-blacklist-feed
label: SSL Blacklist Feed
description:
SSL Blacklist Feed publishes a blacklist containing IPs which can be used to detect botnet C2 traffic from infected machines towards the internet, leaving your network.This connector facilitates automated operations related to fetching the list of IPs blacklist.

This connector has a dependency on the Threat Intel Management Solution Pack. Install the Solution Pack before enabling ingestion of Threat Feeds from this source.

fields.title: Service
fields.name: service
fields.description: Review and select the URL of the SSL Certificate Blacklist service to which you will connect and retrieve data. You can choose between https://sslbl.abuse.ch/blacklist/sslipblacklist.csv or https://sslbl.abuse.ch/blacklist/sslipblacklist_aggressive.csv.
fields.value: abuse.ch SSLBL Botnet C2 IP Blacklist (CSV)
options: abuse.ch SSLBL Botnet C2 IP Blacklist (CSV)
abuse.ch SSLBL Botnet C2 IP Blacklist (CSV) - Aggressive
fields.tooltip: Review and select the URL of the SSL Certificate Blacklist service to which you will connect and retrieve data. You can choose between https://sslbl.abuse.ch/blacklist/sslipblacklist.csv or https://sslbl.abuse.ch/blacklist/sslipblacklist_aggressive.csv.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.

operations.description: Retrieves a list of all indicators from the SSL Certificate Blacklist. You can also filter the indicators retrieved from SSL Certificate Blacklist based on the last pull time you have specified.
operations.title: Fetch Indicators

parameters.title: Last Pull Time
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the time the feeds were last pulled from SSL Certificate Blacklist. In this case, the data will be returned from the SSL Certificate Blacklist only if the feed has been refreshed after the specified time.
parameters.name: last_pull_time
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the time the feeds were last pulled from SSL Certificate Blacklist. In this case, the data will be returned from the SSL Certificate Blacklist only if the feed has been refreshed after the specified time.
